com.github.misberner.apcommons.reporting

Interface Reporter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReporter, AnnotationReporter, ElementReporter, RootReporter, ValueReporter

    public interface Reporter
    An interface for easier reporting of diagnostic messages.

    All reporting methods have an Object varargs parameter. The concrete message is built by concatenating the string representation of all elements of the respective Object array. Note that spaces are not inserted automatically to separate elements. For obtaining the string representation, String.valueOf(Object) is used, hence null values are allowed and have a String representation of "null".

    Author:
    Malte Isberner

      Prints a message of the specified diagnostic kind.
      void note(Object... msgObjects)
      Prints an informational message.
      void other(Object... msgObjects)
      Prints some other type of message.

      Prints a warning message.
